thread.title: Deathwatch, continued: Faraday Future still stalled in the desert
thread.title_full: Deathwatch, continued: Faraday Future still stalled in the desert

author: Richard Read (feedback@highgearmedia.com)
title: Deathwatch, continued: Faraday Future still stalled in the desert
text: Why do we like to watch some companies fail and not others? It usually comes down to the size of their ambitions: the bigger they are, the better the show. That's why the implosion of brash, boastful Faraday Future has been so fascinating. New details about Faraday don't suggest that it's folding or filing for bankruptcy--not yet, anyway. But they...
